citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:30 pm on
17-Aug-17.
No one home at facility, called and left voice messages at home & work phone numbers, waited one-half hour.
